publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1998.1# Richard Lochhead: Encouraging School Debating—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1998) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Executive to actively promote and encourage the use of debate as both a curricular and extra-curricular activity in all Scottish secondary schools." Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram*, Stewart Stevenson*, Jim Mather*, Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Tricia Marwick*
S2M-1998.1# Encouraging School Debating (lodged on 16 November 2004) Alex Neil*

S2M-1998.1# Richard Lochhead: Encouraging School Debating—As an amendment to motion (S2M-1998) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Executive to actively promote and encourage the use of debate as both a curricular and extra-curricular activity in all Scottish secondary schools." Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Stewart Stevenson, Jim Mather, Rob Gibson, Eleanor Scott, Tricia Marwick, Alex Neil
